summary: OPT-1: Only branches 1+2 fully implemented; 3-8 scaffolded in index_schema.json
detail: Hierarchical index branches 3-8 deferred per audit fix OPT-1. Branch 1 = EXECUTION_CHAIN.json (dispatchers/actions/engines). Branch 2 = DATA_TAXONOMY.json (6 data domains). Scaffolds in index_schema.json ready for future expansion.

summary: Knowledge extraction uses DC-based PowerShell script, not MCP server action
detail: extract_knowledge.ps1 at C:\PRISM\knowledge\ takes entries JSON, writes individual .md files per type dir, updates SESSION_KNOWLEDGE_INDEX.json. Chose DC/PS1 over MCP action to avoid rebuild requirement. Works now.

summary: DA phase gate: 4 criteria CC_DEFERRED — subagents, slash commands, skill auto-load
detail: Claude Code not available. Gate criteria 6-9 deferred. Conditional pass issued. When CC becomes available, run E2E test sequence from DA-MS8 spec to fully close. All non-CC infrastructure complete and tested.

summary: Skill tier classification (A/B/C/D) skipped — superseded by MS9-10 atomization
detail: DA-MS2 Step 1 called for classifying 126 skills into tiers. Skipped because DA-MS9/MS10 will atomize all skills into single-function units <=5KB each, making tier classification obsolete. Top 15 identification still needed for atomization priority.

summary: Session survived 3+ compactions; position files + uploaded transcripts enabled recovery each time
detail: CURRENT_POSITION.md, SESSION_HANDOFF.md, and user-uploaded pre-compaction transcripts were the primary recovery mechanisms. autoPreCompactionDump not yet tested in production (implemented this session). Health_check correctly reported GREEN throughout.
